Text.Page:
Ovolith attacks are on the rise west of Camp Zakai. I want you to kill {@LinkCreature:28#2041#tainted ovoliths} and {@LinkCreature:28#3011#noxious ovoliths}.

Report to Ishmela when mission is complete.
Thank you for your hard work. Anything we can do to minimize the danger to our workers is a real boon.
Apologies, but without proof of death, payments aren't authorized.
